```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning = F, message = F)

library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(glue)

# read data
df_assets_data <- readxl::read_excel("../inputs/REACH_UGA_Phone_inventory_tool_Finalized.xlsx") %>% 
  mutate(uuid = `_uuid`,
         start_date = as_date(start),
         start = as_datetime(start),
         end = as_datetime(end))

```

## Number of items by type

```{r, echo = FALSE}
df_assets_data %>% 
   group_by(item_type) %>% 
   summarise(number_of_items = n()) %>% 
   DT::datatable()
```


## Number of items by type

```{r, echo = FALSE}
df_assets_data %>% 
   group_by(item_brand) %>% 
   summarise(number_of_items_by_brand = n()) %>% 
   DT::datatable()
```
